item.title: 美国需求改善，宝洁公司季度销售额超出预期
item.description: 宝洁公司周三公布的第二季度销售额超出预期，原因是潘婷洗发水生产商努力将不同价位的新版产品推向市场，在美国吸引了更多顾客。【原文：Procter & Gamble beat second-quarter sales estimates on Wednesday, as the Pantene shampoo maker's efforts to bring newer versions of its products to the market across various price tiers attracted more customers in the United States.】

item.title: 雅培预计全年医疗器械销售将实现盈利
item.description: 雅培实验室（Abbott Laboratories）周三预测年度利润与华尔街预期一致，因为该公司预计医疗技术相关程序的增加将促进对其设备（包括血糖监测产品）的需求。【原文：Abbott Laboratories on Wednesday forecast annual profit in line with Wall Street estimates, as it expects elevated medtech-related procedures to boost demand for its devices, including glucose-monitoring products.】

item.title: 保险巨头 Travelers 盈利超出预期，承保能力增强
item.description: 财险公司旅行者周三公布的第四季度利润超出预期，原因是其承保业务的强劲表现缓解了巨灾损失增加带来的打击。【原文：Property and casualty insurer Travelers beat estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, as strength in its underwriting business cushioned a blow from elevated catastrophe losses.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，Stellantis 将召回超过 63,000 辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，克莱斯勒母公司斯特兰蒂斯公司正在美国召回 63082 辆跨界 SUV，原因是动力传输装置问题导致驱动力损失。【原文：Chrysler parent Stellantis is recalling 63,082 crossover SUV's in the United States over concerns of loss of drive power due to a power transfer unit issue, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 通用汽车召回 2,000 多辆雪佛兰 Equinox 电动汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，由于自适应巡航控制系统存在问题，通用汽车公司将召回约2890辆雪佛兰Equinox电动汽车。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday that General Motors is recalling about 2,890 Chevrolet Equinox EV vehicles due to concerns about their adaptive cruise control.】

item.title: DP World称，如果红海袭击得到遏制，海运价格可能下降20
item.description: DP World 的副首席执行官说，与以色列无关的船只可能会在两周内开始返回红海，并补充说这可能会导致货运价格 "暴跌"。【原文：Ships not linked to Israel could begin returning to the Red Sea in as little as two weeks, DP World's deputy chief executive said, adding that could see freight prices "come crashing down".】

item.title: 经理人杂志称，大众汽车计划在上半年出售 15%的特拉托股份
item.description: 据《经理人》杂志周三援引未具名公司消息人士的话报道，德国大众汽车公司计划在今年上半年出售其在卡车部门 Traton 公司 15%的股份，希望借此筹集约 20 亿欧元（约合 20.9 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Germany's Volkswagen plans to sell 15% of its shares in truck unit Traton in the first half of this year, hoping to raise about 2 billion euros ($2.09 billion), manager magazin reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed company sources.】

item.title: J&J 因抗癌药物销售而实现超预期的季度销售额和利润
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）刚刚完成以 146 亿美元收购神经系统药物制造商 Intra-Cellular 的交易，本周三公布的第四季度销售额和利润均高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于其癌症治疗药物的强劲销售。【原文：Johnson & Johnson , fresh off a $14.6 billion deal to buy neurological drugmaker Intra-Cellular , reported fourth-quarter sales and profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, driven by strong sales of its cancer treatments.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称巴西 5 家公司输华大豆因植物检疫原因被暂停发货
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士周三告诉路透社，由于巴西大豆货物不符合植物检疫要求，全球最大的大豆买家中国已停止接收来自五个实体的巴西大豆货物。【原文：China, the world's biggest soybean buyer, has stopped receiving Brazilian soybean shipments from five entities after cargoes did not meet phytosanitary requirements, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 花旗银行以地缘政治风险为由上调 2025 年平均油价预期
item.description: 由于以俄罗斯和伊朗为中心的地缘政治风险，花旗银行周三上调了2025年的油价展望，但指出下半年油价可能会有所缓和。【原文：Citi on Wednesday raised its oil price outlook for 2025 due to geopolitical risks centred on Russia and Iran, but noted prices were likely to ease through the second half of the year.】

item.title: 关税威胁迫在眉睫，2024 年美国将从加拿大和墨西哥进口商品
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普考虑于 2 月 1 日对从加拿大和墨西哥进口的商品征收 25% 的关税，焦点已转移到可能首当其冲受到关税影响的行业。【原文：As U.S. President Donald Trump mulls imposing 25% duties on imports from Canada and Mexico on Feb. 1, focus has shifted to the sectors likely to bear the brunt of the tariffs.】

item.title: 早间竞价：特朗普转向人工智能，关税潜伏，Netflix飙升
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 纳斯达克期货在 Netflix 财报和特朗普人工智能投资计划之后领涨
item.description: 由于投资者对流媒体巨头 Netflix 的强劲季度业绩以及唐纳德-特朗普总统对人工智能技术行业数十亿美元的支持表示欢呼，周三美国股指期货上涨，其中与科技股重镇纳斯达克指数相关的股指期货涨幅居前。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Wednesday, with those tied to the tech-heavy Nasdaq in the lead as investors cheered streaming giant Netflix's strong quarterly performance and President Donald Trump's multi-billion show of support for the AI technology industry.】

item.title: 西门子能源看到美国电力驱动带来的 "巨大顺风
item.description: 在新任美国总统宣布私人部门将投资高达 5000 亿美元资助人工智能基础设施建设之后，西门子能源公司董事长周三表示，唐纳德-特朗普的电力战略将带来 "巨大的顺风"。【原文：Siemens Energy sees a "massive tailwind" from Donald Trump's power strategy, its chairperson said on Wednesday, after the new U.S. president announced up to $500 billion of private sector investment to fund infrastructure for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: TikTok 的所有者字节跳动和 DeepSeek 引领中国人工智能推理领域的发展
item.description: TikTok的所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）周三发布了其旗舰人工智能模型的更新，旨在挑战微软支持的OpenAI的最新推理模型产品。【原文：TikTok owner ByteDance on Wednesday released an update to its flagship AI model aimed at challenging Microsoft-backed OpenAI’s latest reasoning model products, as a global race intensified to create AI models capable of tackling complex problems.】

item.title: 中国将允许外国企业在自由贸易区提供新型金融服务
item.description: 中国央行周三表示，中国将给予外资金融机构与国内金融机构同等的待遇，在一些自由贸易区提供国内尚未提供的新型金融服务。【原文：China will grant foreign financial institutions the same treatment as domestic ones in offering new types of financial services not yet available in the country in some free trade zones, the central bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国推出鼓励保险资金进入股市的计划
item.description: 中国周三表示，将引导大型国有保险公司和商业保险基金增加对 A 股市场的投资，这是中国为提振落后的股市而采取的最新举措。【原文：China said on Wednesday it will guide big state insurers and commercial insurance funds to increase investments in the A-share market, in a latest move to boost its lagging stock market.】

item.title: 大众汽车在德国用老方法寻求新时代
item.description: 据公司消息人士透露的细节，尽管大众汽车大谈激进变革，但其在德国的成本削减协议在很大程度上依赖于该汽车制造商的管理者与工人之间的合作传统。【原文：For all its talk of radical change, Volkswagen's cost-cutting deal in Germany relies heavily on the automaker's tradition of cooperation between managers and workers, according to details disclosed by company sources.】

item.title: 日本公司将努力效仿软银，与特朗普大干一场
item.description: 软银首席执行官孙正义（Masayoshi Son）计划在美国投资数十亿美元发展人工智能，这表明了应对特朗普新政府的一种方法：大干一场，稍后再处理细节问题。【原文：SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son's plan to invest billions in AI in the United States shows one way to handle the new Trump administration: go big and deal with the details later.】

item.title: Azul-Gol 航空公司合并可能是崎岖巴西市场的 "必要之恶
item.description: 专家和律师告诉路透社，巴西两家顶级航空公司的合并计划很可能会获得监管部门的批准，因为政府对财务健康行业的推动超过了对竞争受限的担忧。【原文：A plan to merge two of Brazil's top airlines to create a dominant carrier will likely win regulatory approval as a government push for a financially healthy sector outweighs concern about restricted competition, experts and lawyers told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道全球医疗基金担心政府退缩，推动更多私人资金投入
item.description: 在美国决定退出世界卫生组织之后，人们对政府捐款不足的担忧与日俱增，世界上最大的全球卫生资助机构之一将要求私营部门大幅增加捐款。【原文：One of the world's biggest global health funders will ask the private sector for a steep increase in donations as concern of a shortfall in government contributions grows following a U.S. decision to exit the World Health Organization.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯推动 DAX 指数创新高，欧洲股市扩大涨幅
item.description: 周三，欧洲股市延续了近期的涨势，阿迪达斯假日季度的强劲表现推动德国股市创下历史新高，医疗保健类股涨势强劲。【原文：European stocks extended their recent run of gains on Wednesday, with strong holiday-quarter performance from Adidas pushing German shares to record highs and healthcare stocks posting strong gains.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔董事会开会讨论将总部迁回加泰罗尼亚的事宜
item.description: 西班牙萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell）在给股票市场监管机构的一份声明中说，该银行计划于周三召开董事会特别会议，讨论将其总部从阿利坎特迁回加泰罗尼亚的事宜。【原文：Spain's Banco Sabadell plans to hold an extraordinary board meeting on Wednesday to discuss the transfer of its headquarters back to Catalonia from Alicante, the bank said in a statement to the stock market supervisor.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国下令为国有金融企业设定薪酬上限
item.description: 三位消息人士称，中国将对中央政府所属金融机构工作人员的年收入设定 100 万元（137,309 美元）的上限，在经济放缓的背景下扩大了打击过高收入的行动。【原文：China is set to impose a 1 million yuan ($137,309) cap on the annual income of staff at central government-owned financial institutions, three sources said, expanding a campaign against excess against a backdrop of economic slowdown.】

item.title: Blackstone 计划出售 Hotel Investment Partners，Cinco Dias 报道
item.description: 据西班牙报纸 Cinco Dias 周三援引几位身份不明的市场消息人士的话报道，私募股权投资基金 Blackstone 正在准备出售总部位于西班牙的 Hotel Investment Partners (HIP)，该公司价值 65 亿欧元（67.7 亿美元）。【原文：Private equity fund Blackstone is readying the sale of Spain-based Hotel Investment Partners (HIP), which is worth 6.5 billion euros ($6.77 billion), Spanish newspaper Cinco Dias reported on Wednesday, citing several unidentified market sources.】

item.title: 特朗普公布 5000 亿美元人工智能计划后，甲骨文股价上涨 9
item.description: 周三，甲骨文股价在法兰克福跳涨近 9%，此前美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，甲骨文公司将与 OpenAI 和软银（SoftBank）一起对人工智能基础设施进行大规模投资。【原文：Oracle shares jumped nearly 9% in Frankfurt on Wednesday, after U.S. President Donald Trump said the company would make a large investment in artificial intelligence infrastructure, together with OpenAI and SoftBank .】

item.title: Netflix 用户数创历史新高，计划提价，股价大涨
item.description: 在法兰克福上市的 Netflix 周二表示，假日季度吸引的用户数量创下历史新高，该公司股价在周三早盘交易中上涨了 14.3%。【原文：Netflix shares listed in Frankfurt rose 14.3% in early trading on Wednesday after the streaming service said on Tuesday it attracted a record number of subscribers over the holiday quarter.】

item.title: 可可价格飙升，巴里-卡乐宝销量下降
item.description: 巧克力生产商和可可加工商巴里-卡乐堡公司（Barry Callebaut）周三报告称，由于可可价格创历史新高，客户与零售商之间的定价谈判以及订单延迟，公司第一季度的销售量低于预期。【原文：Chocolate maker and cocoa processor Barry Callebaut on Wednesday reported a lower sales volume than expected for its first quarter, hit by customer-retailer pricing negotiations and delayed orders amidst record high cocoa prices.】

item.title: 早安他们知道 "星际之门 "是科幻片吧？
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 中国 CATL 警告收入下降，利润增长放缓，股价下跌
item.description: 全球最大的电池生产商 CATL 周三股价下跌近 4%，此前这家中国公司警告称，去年其年收入首次出现下滑，利润增速为 2019 年以来最慢。【原文：Shares in CATL , the world's largest battery maker, dropped nearly 4% on Wednesday after the Chinese company warned that its annual revenue fell for the first time last year and that profit grew at its slowest pace since 2019.】
